Summary: bright light all colors going fast stop left right then landed
trends: There have been 4 other sightings in Spruce Grove
There were no other sightings in Spruce Grove on or around August 30th 2013
divs: Sighting DetailsAt 905pm on Friday august 30 I saw a very bright white light coming towards me in the sky, It shape was almost round like two bowls together, And about the size of a car. I watched it come closer and was traveling at same as a plane, About half mile or less it just stopped, stayed their for 20 seconds, then blue lights blinked on one side then red on the other side, it started moving left and stop, Then right and stop, then changing different colors with red and green, then traveling left then stop, then right stop then around then stop then back again to left right., still changing colors again to blue on one side and white on the other, this was all in 1-2 minutes, then it stopped and all colors came on and started coming down behind trees in front of me, This was like nothing I have ever seen and I have a aerospace background hope other people saw it also, After it went behind the trees me ears popped.,
